definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: Check out this interactive checklist before you start to pack.
sentences.chinese: 在开始行李打包前核对一下物品清单。

sentences.english: Is there any discrepancy in the title deed of house?
sentences.chinese: 请稍等，请核对契证上是否有出入？

sentences.english: Proofs submitted by the printer should be carefully checked to eliminate typographical errors.
sentences.chinese: 排版工人应当仔细核对提交的校样，避免印刷错误。

sentences.english: I wonder if you could check Mr. Sakai" s European itinerary."
sentences.chinese: 我想知道你能不能核对一下酒井先生欧洲的行程。

sentences.english: Let me re-check my facts here.
These are your financial expenses, please review again.
sentences.chinese: 这些费用是你们的财务费用，请核对。

sentences.english: He has checked the copy against the original.
sentences.chinese: 他已把抄件与原文核对过了。

sentences.english: Please check the list so as to avoid mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 请籽细核对单子以避拟涪生错误。

sentences.english: Would you like to come down to and check them?
sentences.chinese: 您愿意下楼来核对一下吗？

sentences.english: You should check each item off as she dictates the list.
sentences.chinese: 她念清单时你应当逐项核对并打勾。

sentences.english: There is need to check the accuracy of these figures.
sentences.chinese: 有必要核对一下这些数字的精确性。

sentences.english: Check Gyro and Magnetic courses frequently.
sentences.chinese: 经常核对陀螺罗经和磁罗经航向。

sentences.english: If you compute the curl, you can check each of these.
sentences.chinese: 如果你计算旋度的话，所有这些都可以核对的。

sentences.english: Checks invoices against goods ordered and received.
sentences.chinese: 核对货品定单及收货与发票是否一致。

sentences.english: B: We check their production schedule against our orders almost every day.
sentences.chinese: 我们几乎每天核对他们的生产进度以跟进订单。

sentences.english: If a retransmission request is asked by CRC check, it needs to retransmit the whole packet.
sentences.chinese: 在循环冗赘核对中若需要重传将使得整个封包被重传。

definition: to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
to reconsider/to reexamine/to review (e.g. a report prior to accepting it)
to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
